value.message: Variable 'cn' uses an uncommon abbreviation and does not clearly indicate its purpose.
value.suggestion: Rename 'cn' to a more descriptive name such as 'classNames' to clarify its intent.

value.message: Permissions for password reset are controlled using userId and token from client-side searchParams without backend ownership verification in this code.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend API verifies that the userId and token belong to the authenticated user and are valid before allowing password reset. Do not rely solely on client-provided IDs.
